name: Prositos UI Starter Kit
description:
What makes Prositos UI unique?

  1. Only things that are essential to start crafting UXs
  2. Accessibility-driven, from typography to most of the components
  3. Typography, only recommended font sizes and reading lengths for accessibility, no predefined text styles
  4. Colors, just primary, secondary, and one set of neutrals
  5. Components, atom level only
  6. Icons, basic icons to make the components viable


Why?

Out of a personal need to have a small set of essential design elements to kick-start my projects and focus on UX instead of figuring out colors, fonts, basic components, etc.


However, given different apps need different type pairing, therefore, different font sizes, and weight, I decided NOT to create text styles.


Credit (please support these amazing resources)

  • Colors are from tailwindcss
  • Icons are from Streamline Icons
  • Design system methodology based on Atomic Design
  • Oscar Ko made the components, and most of them have been preference tested on UsabilityHub and evaluated repeatedly through his in-house and freelance projects
